description:
Brian is a very cute 24-year old with nice, tight abs and a hot, long dick. He's a bartender by night, which leaves his days free. So what does he do during the day? You guessed it... chase pussy. Of all the techniques I've heard for getting girls (and trust me, I've heard a lot of them) I think Brian has to have one of the most original. I'll let him tell you himself...
At the end of the movie, he shoots a nice big wad all over the bed and then jokes with me about having had to wait 24 hours. In case you're wondering, I make all of my guys go at least 24 hours without busting a nut before we do a video. Brian said that just about killed him because he's used to dropping his load three times a day. Yeah, I'm a task master, but someone has to keep these boys in line <grin>.
title: Brian
